snippet.title: Sacred Earth - Reverie Boss 02: Fell Leos (Nightmare Mode)
snippet.description:
Just a playthrough of the demo's second boss on the hardest difficulty. ...Things got real touch and go multiple times there, but ultimately I managed to push through for the win.

- - - - - - - - - - -

Sacred Earth - Reverie is an RPG with visual novel elements, inspired by JRPG classics. Explore dungeons, build your characters, and battle foes in fast paced turn-based combat as you journey with your allies to discover the lost history of the past.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2937520/Sacred_Earth__Reverie/
Itch.io: https://miragev.itch.io/sacred-earth-reverie
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MirageV_
